name: Mr Crab's adventure -In the giant whale
name_original: Mr Crab's adventure -In the giant whale
description: In the Mr Crab's adventure game,  help Mr Crab bring Bob Jr. home safe and sound before dinner time! Navigate the perils of the deep blue sea and the big blue whale's stomach to save Bob Jr. while avoiding detection from Mrs. Bob. Will you be able to get Bob Jr. home in time?
